product_name: Backpacker's Pantry Cold Potato Salad - 2 Servings
long_description: The Backpacker's Pantry Cold Potato salad includes a flavorful mix of potatoes, eggs, veggies, cheese and organic olive oil. Just add cold water and enjoy! Add olive oil to other ingredients, then add 3/4 cup of cold water to all contents; stir well, let sit for 3 min, stirring occasionally, then serve. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: The Backpacker's Pantry Cold Potato salad includes a flavorful mix of potatoes, eggs, veggies, cheese and organic olive oil. Just add cold water and enjoy!
